General.Name: Nextage Therapeutics Ltd
General.Description: Nextage Cannabis Innovation Ltd. manufactures cannabis products. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel. Nextage Cannabis Innovation Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Nextar Chempharma Solutions Ltd.
General.Address: Einstein St. Building 13B, Ness Ziona, Israel, 4147
